ca.uqac.lif.labpal

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.Random
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Random
extends Random
    Random number generator that remembers the seed it was instantiated with.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
